they've learned nothing about managing

now it's going to be very difficult to

let's not talk about Greece and the

out

because remember each country they have

it's intertwined within our system and
that's why it's a little bit easier but

that we're starting to see the economy

and I'm sure if they looked at the other

compares current prices to their

they don't see any end
in sight right now and they're saying

now we're experiencing a bubble not in
